doc.title: Nothing But Dreams
doc.plot: An action packed film about the struggles and courage behind the life of a mafia wife named Margie. In the heart of the roaring 20's, Margie thought she had it all, the perfect man or so she thought. By the 30's, the Great Depression began not only in America, but in the confines of Margie's own home. Witnessing numerous illegal acts, from smuggling booze, gambling, and even murder, Margie struggles to leave the only life she's known, for the sake of her young daughter. Will Margie find the courage to leave or will her fears be the cause of her own untimely demise?
